activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10508
activity.text:
Hi @nihal467, 

I'm an aspiring GSoC 2025 contributor and I'm interested in CARE HR Management Module. However, I have a question. The HR Management Module involves both frontend and backend features. Must an interested applicant be able to handle all requirements specified for both the frontend & backend requirements or an interested applicant can propose to contribute to just the frontend requirements?

I'm looking forward to your response!
